title: How Many Calories Does Kissing Burn Per Minute? Pecks, Make Outs & More

steps.title: Kissing usually burns between 2 to 5 calories per minute.
steps.content: Kissing usually burns between 2 to 5 calories per minute. Kissing raises your heart rate similarly to light physical activity, so you can burn a few calories while smooching your partner! How many calories you burn largely depends on the type of kiss, the length and intensity of your smooches, and your position (sitting, dancing, lying with your partner, etc.): [1] X Research source A peck or casual kiss burns around 2 to 3 calories per minute. Passionate kisses (making out, French kissing) burn around 5 to 26 calories per minute. Caressing your partner as you kiss can burn around 5 calories per minute. Dancing while you kiss your partner can burn around 6 calories per minute. How many calories you burn also comes down to other factors, like your weight, age, and sex. [2] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source To ensure you’re giving the perfect kiss , dating coach Eddy Baller recommends that you “match your partner.” Follow their movements so you “fit together like a puzzle.”

steps.title: Kissing can improve your health and help you bond with your partner.
steps.content: Kissing can improve your health and help you bond with your partner. Kissing isn’t just fun—it actually has a lot of great health benefits, too! For instance, regularly locking lips with your significant other can: [3] X Research source Reduce stress and anxiety. Improve your immune system and ability to fight off sickness. Lower blood pressure and improve heart health. Help you maintain or lose weight. Improve your sleep quality. Boost teeth and gum health due to increased saliva production. Help you bond and connect with your partner. Make you feel happy and euphoric due to the release of oxytocin, dopamine, and serotonin.

steps.title: Intimate activities like foreplay and sex can also burn calories.
steps.content: Intimate activities like foreplay and sex can also burn calories. Getting hot and heavy with your partner can often feel like a workout and there’s a good reason—sex and foreplay also burn calories! Like with kissing, how many calories you burn depends on the length and intensity of your romantic rendezvous, as well as the position you’re in. In general: [4] X Trustworthy Source PLOS ONE Online peer-reviewed, open access scientific research journal Go to source Sex burns around 5 calories per minute. On average, men burn 100 calories in a 30-minute session while women burn 69 calories. Foreplay (oral sex, massages , cuddling, etc.) burns around 2 to 4 calories per minute (60 to 112 calories per 30 minutes). Masturbating burns around 5 calories per minute (150 calories per 30 minutes).
